title: American Horror Stories Episode 3 Drive In Synopsis and Review
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I personally didn’t like this one. I loved the idea and everything but it was way too short and I wanted a better explanation and kind of expected one. And I still think it would be cool if Ryan filled in plot holes in the ahs universe than create more like. What happened to Scarlett and Lachlan? (Hotel) what happened to Lee’s daughter Emily? (Roanoke) how about kits kids (asylum) What about Bette and dot and Jimmy’s baby? (Freak show) I could go on for hours about how many cool things he could do with this show that would connect to the original show that’s what I kind of expected for American horror stories not a bunch of stories and are all completely new people I thought we’d see some more backstories and stuff like that
I love the play on Horror movie stereotypes. Normally, the characters having sex are killed but in this episode, the making out is what actually saved them.

I enjoyed it, as ahs is bae, but am I the only one who wants a darker spin off instead of the teeny bopper stuff? Don’t get me wrong, I’m having fun, but I don’t feel the scares as much. You da best Mary! So glad to see some reviews!🖤missed you gurllll
He has the Rolls Royce because of the Netflix deal? 💁🏻‍♂️
I think this was an improvement over the first 2 episodes .i loved the horror .i would have seen a full movie based on this concept
